Title: Vote
Description_0: Vote Chiaki Nanami to get free rewards
Description_1: After voting, you will receive the rewards in your mail.
Description_3: Voting on the weekends will give you twice the rewards.
VoteState_CanVote: You are free to vote now by clicking the "Vote" button below and following the instructions.
VoteState_CannotVote0: You already voted in the last 12 hours.
SpecialGift_Description: Vote 14 times to get a special vote gift as a bonus.
